facts.name: Annunciation [Evangelismós tis Theotókou]
facts.description: Celebration of the Annunciation – when the Incarnation of Logos was announced to the Virgin Mary.

facts.name: Independence Day [Ikostí-pémpti Martíou]
facts.description: Anniversary of the declaration of the start of Greek War of Independence from the Ottoman Empire, in 1821.
